meta.title: SEO Cannibalization Checker | Boring Tools
meta.description: Check if specific keywords are competing across multiple pages on your site. Easily identify SEO cannibalization issues.

title: SEO Cannibalization Checker
description: Enter a domain and keyword to check for keyword cannibalization (competition) within your site.

keyword.label: Keyword
keyword.help: You can search for multiple words

result.title: Search Results
result.description: Click the link below to view Google search results. If multiple pages are displayed, cannibalization may be occurring.
